quotes: She was appointed Commander of the Order of the British Empire (CBE) in the 2025 New Year Honours for services to drama.

organizations.name: British Academy Film Award
quotes: Mulligan has received numerous accolades, including a British Academy Film Award and a Critics' Choice Movie Award, in addition to nominations for three Academy Awards, four Golden Globe Awards, five Screen Actors Guild Awards and a Tony Award.
